title: WSP to Buy Warburg-Owned Engineering Firm for $3.3 Billion
description: Canada’s WSP Global Inc. reached a deal to buy a US engineering firm from Warburg Pincus LLC with the financial backing of its largest shareholder, Quebec’s public pension fund.
content: Canada’s WSP Global Inc. reached a deal to buy a US engineering firm from Warburg Pincus LLC with the financial backing of its largest shareholder, Quebec’s public pension fund.
